body:
I am a big fan of Python myself, and wrote a few simple scripts for me to use with radiance. I am no programmer, so can encourage and support any designer to take a look at the Python language, it's quite fun!

Btw, would be interested: are there professional Radiance modules for Python out there already? I once googled for them but without success.

--

Aksel Gro?
aksel at gobo.io


Am 03.12.2012 um 12:57 schrieb info info <info at pythonpoweredbuilding.com>:

subject: [Radiance-general] Leveraging the Python language in BuildingPerformance Simulation
